sourcesContent:
export const fontSizes = {
  xxxsm: 4,
  xxsm: 6,
  xsm: 10,
  sm: 12,
  md: 16,
  lg: 24,
  xl: 32,
  xxl: 40,
  xxxl: 80,
};

export const spacing = {
  xxxsm: 2,
  xxsm: 4,
  xsm: 6,
  sm: 8,
  md: 16,
  lg: 24,
  xl: 32,
  xxl: 38,
  xxxl: 64,
};
